item.description:
Nineteen fellow foodies agree with Nicole's suggestion to check out Six Burner, which is one reason we're having brunch here.

Here are a couple of other reasons:

Across from Back Bay station, Firefly has changed into Six Burner, serving "Inspired Comfort Food (just like your mom's cooking, just a little more amped up)." - boston.com

Check out the link below for a recent Six Burner review by Mat Schaffer
http://www.bostonhera...

This is also your chance to meet friendly easy going folks while enjoying a good and reasonably priced meal.

Six Burner Brunch Menu
Please be prompt and prepared to pay for what you consume.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Six Burner Burner Brunch on May Day
